resources.string: Please, use only one finger to do the test

In this game you will see this circling wheel 5 times. If you like you can watch it for long, alternatively you can stop it sooner and go onto the next trial. To go onto the next trial and stop the wheel sooner please touch the red button on the right lower corner.
Please make sure that the child\'s face is at one arm\'s distance from the screen.
Do you want to go back, make a new attempt, or start the next test?
Do you want to go back, make a new attempt, or start the next test?
An error occurred while uploading Wheel test
